introduction_english: Let's dive into the word "にゅういん," a term you're likely to hear when discussing medical situations or when someone needs medical attention.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "にゅういん" means "hospitalization." It describes the action of admitting someone into a hospital to receive treatment or care. It's often used when someone needs to stay in a hospital for an extended period due to an illness or medical procedure.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 入所 : にゅうしょ : admission
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word "にゅういん" is "にゅうしょ." While "にゅういん" specifically refers to entering a hospital, "にゅうしょ" is a broader term used for entering facilities like nursing homes or facilities for long-term care, which are not exclusively medical.
antonyms: 退院 : たいいん : leaving hospital
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word "にゅういん" is "たいいん." While "にゅういん" refers to being admitted to a hospital, "たいいん" means leaving or being discharged from a hospital after treatment is complete.

example_sentences.kanji: 母は病院に入院しました。
example_sentences.furigana: 母(はは)は病院(びょういん)に入院(にゅういん)しました。

translations.EN: My mother was admitted to the hospital.
translations.ES: Mi madre fue ingresada en el hospital.
translations.FR: Ma mère a été admise à l'hôpital.
translations.BN: আমার মাকে হাসপাতালে ভর্তি করা হয়েছে।
translations.TL: Ang aking ina ay na-admit sa ospital.
translations.MY: မိခင်ကြီးကို ဆေးရုံမှာ တက်ထားပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मेरी माँ को अस्पताल में भर्ती किया गया।

example_sentences.furigana: 入院(にゅういん)中(ちゅう)です。

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は入院計画を立てています。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は入院(にゅういん)計画(けいかく)を立(た)てています。

translations.EN: He is making a hospitalization plan.
translations.ID: Dia sedang membuat rencana rawat inap.
translations.ES: Él está haciendo un plan de hospitalización.
translations.VI: Anh ấy đang lập kế hoạch nhập viện.
translations.FR: Il est en train de préparer un plan d'hospitalisation.
translations.BN: তিনি হাসপাতালে ভর্তি করার পরিকল্পনা করছেন।
translations.TL: Siya ay gumagawa ng plano para maospital.
translations.MY: သူက ဆေးရုံတက်စဉ်း လုပ်နေပါတယ်။
translations.HI: वह अस्पताल में भर्ती की योजना बना रहा है।
translations.FA: او در حال برنامه‌ریزی برای بستری شدن است.

example_sentences.kanji: 私は昨日入院しました。
example_sentences.furigana: 私は(わたしは)昨日(きのう)入院(にゅういん)しました。

translations.EN: I was admitted to the hospital yesterday.
translations.ES: Ayer me ingresaron en el hospital.
translations.VI: Tôi đã nhập viện hôm qua.
translations.FR: Je suis entré à l'hôpital hier.
translations.MY: မနေ့က ဆေးရုံ အိပ်ခဲ့တယ်။
translations.HI: मैं कल अस्पताल में भर्ती हुआ।

meanings_translations.MY: သေတ္တာသို့ဝင်ခြင်း
